'''1.21.7 Release Candidate 2''' (known as '''1.21.7-rc2''' in the [[launcher]]) is the second and final release candidate for [[Java Edition 1.21.7]], released on June 26, 2025.<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-21-7-release-candidate-2|Minecraft 1.21.7 Release Candidate 2|June 26, 2025}}</ref> This version fixes bugs and updates the [[pack format]] versions due to there having been breaking changes in [[Java Edition 1.21.7 Release Candidate 1|the previous release candidate]].

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Data pack]]'''
* The [[pack format]] version is now {{cd|81}}.

'''[[Resource pack]]'''
* The [[pack format]] version is now {{cd|64}}.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MC|fixedin=1.21.7 Release Candidate 2
|;From 1.21.6
|298879|The game crashes upon startup on some AMD graphics
|299110|Force upgrading does not write new DataVersion to converted data
|299126|The server crashes when certain mobs ride a turtle
|;prev
|299130|Pack formats were not incremented in 1.21.7 rc1 after breaking changes
}}</onlyinclude>
